note: GenX Gamer, Techie, Nerd. Enjoys good friends, good food, good music.  Apple enthusiast, Tesla driver (no love for Elon), Nine Inch Nails / Depeche Mode fan. Thinks rockets that can land themselves are cool and that self-driving is a long way from being road-ready. Been there, tried that, turned it off. Believes in science not myth, takes advice from educated experts not online influencers, remembers a time when facts mattered and falsehood wasn’t considered to be an alternate opinion.
